item.title: My Psychic Radio with Kimberanne and guest Joseph LoBrutto - Feb 15,2010
item.description:
Joseph is a loving channel connecting you with your loved ones on the other side. As a mental medium he will sometimes take on the personality of the deceased person by mimicking mannerisms you may remember from when they were alive. He is an extraordinary Psychic and Medium. One of Joseph’s greatest accomplishments as an author is to publish one of the most enlightening books available in the New Age market; Is There More To Life Than What We Know? A Spiritual Journey and Awakening in Finding God. “The book was so captivating and alluring I could not put it down. The anticipation of intriguing topics kept my interest at peak throughout the whole book. *Tested as Legitimate**-reviewed and featured on The “Best Psychic Mediums" list on Medium Channel My reading with Joseph was like no other mediumistic reading I have had. Joseph LoBrutto is listed as one of the best Psychics on Medium Channel, a featured psychic on American Association of Psychics, and the Bob Olson Best Psychic Directory. Joseph is truly a legitimate certified psychic medium, he is becoming known world-wide and has appeared on television and radio. For more information on Joseph, see: www.ourjourneyoflife.com Call in for your live readings tonight.

free psychic readings | kimberanne | pro psychic chat | astrology | tarot

item.title: Solana Welcomes Trish Thomas-Mink - Feb 13,2010
item.description:
Trish Thomas-Mink is a Psychic Medium with strong empathic abilities. She is Clairaudient and Clairvoyant. Also her abilities allow her to assist her clients with relationship issues, and issues relating to success. She has 20 years of recovery from alcohol, codependency and approaches her work with a strong focus on personal responsibility. She is a certified Hypnotherapist trained at the Southwest Institute of Healing Arts in Tempe, Arizona. As a Reiki Master Teacher she can help you heal both physically and spiritually. She is constantly upgrading her skills and knowledge in helping her clients develop a relationship to a God of their understanding, and a relationship with themselves. . As a Life Coach she can not only connect with spirit, but help you to live your dreams. She is a writer and a singer. She lives in Phoenix, Arizona with her son, a cat and a charming puggle

item.title: My Psychic Radio with Kimberanne and - Feb 08,2010
item.description:
Tonight's pictures: http://www.propsychicchat.com/picforlynn.html Join us tonight as we welcome Lynn Sheurell for an evening of face reading. Did you know that your face contains information about yourself? Face reading is a 6000 year old ancient art & science from China. Who we are and what we’ve experienced & where we’re going is reflected in our face. By understanding your face, you become more aware of your own decision-making, relationship to personal power, & how you perceive the world, amongst a whole lot more. Lynn Scheurell is a professional face reader & a catalyst. She teaches soul-driven entrepreneurs how to use the tools of intuition to increase their awareness, one of which is the ancient art of face reading, to help you use your own natural tools to move forward in business & in life. Our Host for tonight's show is Kimberanne

item.title: Solana Welcomes Medium April Crawford - Jan 30,2010
item.description:
April Crawford is one of the most adept deep trance channels in the world today with over 15 years of experience providing readings and personal consultations for individuals, groups, and businesses. April was selected as the featured practitioner in the made for TV Pilot of "Mind Codes". April is also the author of “Parting Notes”: A Connection With The Afterlife (www.PartingNotes.com), which is available in hard cover and soft cover at Amazon.com and BarnesandNobel.com. April’s next book, Ashram Tang, is a story with spiritual metaphysics themes that was written by several of the non-physical entities while April was in deep trance. As with “Parting Notes”, Ashram Tang is being published in essentially first, final, and only draft and is scheduled for release in Spring 2010. If you would like to schedule a personal one-on-one telephone consultation and reading with VERONICA, or if you have questions about readings, address them to April’s facilitator, Allen, at AprilReadings@aol.com To receive “Inner Whispers” the free spiritual newsletter written mostly by the Entity VERONICA, visit www.InnerWhispers.net [Note: It is dot NET ….. not dot com… for “Inner Whispers”.]

propsychchat | readings | solana | april crawford | channeling

item.title: Solana Welcomes Kim Gould - Jan 23,2010
item.description:
Solana welcomes Kim Gould, Kim's mission in this life is to show you another way to view the energies around us. If there is to be a twenty first century, it will need to reflect a new level of spiritual wisdom and intuitive insight. Carolyn Myss Many people have an intellectual undestanding of their spiritual selves, how they'd like to be in the world, how they'd like to express their creative intelligence, have relationships. Many people struggle with how to live from this place within themselves. The most common question people ask about spiritual growth and personal development is "But HOW do I DO that!" The reason it's hard to know the answer to this question is because the HOW is different for each one of us. http://www.loveyourdesign.com/

item.title: My Psychic Radio with Kimberanne and Guest, Debra Clement - Jan 11,2010
item.description:
Debra Clement, J.D., is an internationally known astrologer with more than 20 years of professional experience counseling clients from all walks of life. She is well recognized for the accuracy of her predictive work, as well as for her expertise in relationship and vocational astrology. Throughout the years, Debra has credited this science-based art as the anchor that sustained her through some very difficult times. She discovered her passion for astrology after reading Linda Goodman’s groundbreaking book, Sun Signs, when she was 16 years old. She is a self-taught astrologer who attributes her talent and success in this profession to a horoscope that strongly indicates a gift for astrology. In addition to offering private consultations, Debra lectures, teaches, and conducts workshops and is in the process of completing her first book.

Free psychic readings | psychics | astrology | tarot | psychic mediums

She is well recognized for the accuracy of her predictive work, as well as for her expertise in relationship and vocational astrology. Throughout the years, Debra has credited this science-based art as the anchor that sustained her through some very difficult times. She discovered her passion for astrology after reading Linda Goodman’s groundbreaking book, Sun Signs, when she was 16 years old. She is a self-taught astrologer who attributes her talent and success in this profession to a horoscope that strongly indicates a gift for astrology. In addition to offering private consultations, Debra lectures, teaches, and conducts workshops and is in the process of completing her first book.
item.itunes:author: MPKimberanne
item.itunes:keywords: Free psychic readings,psychics,astrology,tarot,psychic mediums,BlogTalkRadio, Blog Talk Radio
item.itunes:subtitle: My Psychic Radio with Kimberanne and Guest, Debra Clement

item.title: Solana Welcomes Medium Mark Anthony - Jan 09,2010
item.description:
Tonight join Solana in Welcoming Psychic Medium Mark Anthony. With an unexpected visit from ELVIS PRESLEY!!! Check it out, during the show out of no where, the song "Glory Glory" began playing. This song is NOT on our switchboard, so could not have been stopped! Listen in for yourselves and hear it with your own ears. Mark Anthony is a practicing medium, descended from a long line of psychics and mediums. For over 100 years, his ancestors have had significant psychic and mediumistic ability. These courageous people of faith had to cope with extraordinary challenges. Although he has inherited the ability to communicate with spirits, he did not go public until he experienced a profound life-altering reading conducted by world famous medium, John Edward. Since that time, he has worked conscientiously to expand his psychic and mediumistic gifts to the fullest potential. He has consulted and studied with some of the most prolific mediums and psychics of our time including Lydia Clar, Eamonn Downey, Sylvia Browne, and Colette Baron-Reid. Mr. Anthony is also a successful attorney and certified mediator, licensed to practice law in Florida, Washington D.C., and before the United States Supreme Court. An accomplished public speaker, Mark regularly lectures not only on the law, but also on Life after Death and Contact with the Spirit World. It is now Mark’s mission to use his abilities as a medium to assist those suffering with grief from the loss of a loved one. http://www.healgriefwithbelief.com/

Pro Psychic Chat | psychic readings | psychics | chakra | healing

item.title: The Spirit Weaver with Kimberanne - Jan 04,2010
item.description:
Join us tonight as we welcome Homey3, author o"Prophecies with a Divine Answer!!!". Joining us for the first time, Homey will discuss the messages he has received from God that will affect all of us in the near future. His messages, although straight forward, aren't intended to cause fear or panic, but to assure the public that there is hope. You can find more information about Homey here: Website: http://www.homey3.com Other Websites where you can communicate with Homey3 and get the latest info: http://www.YouTube.com/homey3 http://www.Twitter.com/homey3 Http://www.MySpace.com/homey3
